front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks -- Media Access Control (MAC) Bridges and Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks Amendment: Cyclic Queuing and Forwarding

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs)
front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2014 describes the use of traffic scheduling and per-stream filtering and policing to support cyclic queuing and forwarding.
